name: Not happy guy
description:
One not very happy guy and more than 450 dangerous traps in his way! Very difficult game, if you pass it to the end, you will enter the world history !!! (but it is not exactly)
Lasers, fire, saws, hidden spikes,  - and much more will be waiting for you on the way ... If you get to them alive.
Good luck!

Keyboard controls:

WAD or Arrow keys for move

Touch controls:

Сlick anywhere if you don’t see the controls
